project1.title: K-Mart Ecosystem
project1.description: A complete e-commerce platform including store, blog, admin dashboard, and custom API. Built with modern React tooling and full authentication, data management and UI systems.

project2.title: upydate
project2.description: A Python-based scraper designed to cleanly deliver downloads, automating a process that was previously impossible manually at the workshop.

project3.title: JSONtoVCF Converter
project3.description: A tool built for a client to convert Telegram JSON exports into import-ready VCF contact files. Designed for reliability and ease of use.
